DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to determine whether the type of iron in infant cereals makes a differance in how well the cereal helps infants remain free of iron deficiency.
DOC.brief_title: Cereals as a Source of Iron for Breastfed Infants
DOC.criteria: exclusively breastfed birth weight between 2500 and 4200g gestational age >36 weeks supplementing formula no iron drops
